Package com.camerontec.catalys.server.configuration

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IMutableConfiguration
    An IConfiguration that can be modified.
    IMutableConfigurationWithCustomAttributes
    'Custom attributes' are attributes which are not declared in our DTD but which the custom added to a modified DTD)
    IReuseComponentsDuringReload
    Interface for objects that re-use components during new configuration reload (e.g have a ReusableComponentsRegistry).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigurationAgent
    This class is created by catalys and can be used to access the configuration of the Catalys server.
    ConfigurationConstants
    Configuration constants.
    ConfigurationConstants.Attributes
    Name of XML attributes needed for parsing.
    ConfigurationConstants.Elements
    Configuration element names.
    ConfigurationConstants.TechologyAdapter  
    ConfigurationInitializer
    Initialises configuration objects.
    ConfigurationReferenceHolder
    Immutable container for references to the main configuration objects.
    ConfigurationReloader
    Reloads the configuration of the Catalys server from an IConfigurationReader.
    ConfigurationValidator
    Validates a ConfigurationObjectRegistry.
    ConfiguredObjectFactory
    Factory for creating configured objects.
    ConnectionPointConfigInMemory
    Memory based (ie non persistent) implementation of IConnectionPointConfiguration.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConfigurationOperation
    Enumeration of all operations exposed by the ConfigurationAgent.
    IMutableConfiguration.Verbosity  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BadRequestConfigurationException
    Thrown to reject a configuration operation due to invalid arguments.
    IllegalOperationConfigurationException
    Thrown to reject a configuration operation.
    UnexpectedConfigurationFailureException
    Thrown when there is an unexpected error configuring Catalys.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    ConfigurationAttributeDescription
    Descriptor of configuration attribute used to wrap attribute descriptions.
